name: Valid feature request
description: Clear feature request related to PDF processing should be valid

input.title: Add support for extracting form field values
input.body:
## Feature Request

It would be great if the library could extract form field values from fillable PDFs.

## Use Case
We have many fillable PDF forms submitted by users and need to extract the data programmatically.

## Proposed Solution
Add an option like `extract_form_fields=True` that returns form field names and their values.

## Alternatives Considered
- Using PyPDF2 separately for forms (but would prefer a unified solution)
- Manual text extraction (unreliable for structured data)
